sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function useEffectHook() { const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [json, setJSON] = useState(); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1') .then(response => response.json()) .then(json => setJSON(json.title)) }, [count] == 2); return (

Click count: {count}

{json}

setCount(count + 1)}> Click Event
setCount(0)}> Clear
); } export default useEffectHook
